is.gui.delphi_shop.name: Delphi Shop
is.abilities.speed.name: Speed
is.abilities.strength.name: Strength
is.abilities.agility.name: Agility
is.item.alfia_amulet.magic_description: Amulet of a insurgent named Alfia.
is.item.alfia_amulet.description.1: Pressing RMB gives a player fly ability for 30 seconds.
is.item.gerdes_amulet.magic_description: Amulet of a rebel named Gerdes.
is.item.gerdes_amulet.description.1: When activated, the amulet enhances the Legendary Sword, adding a strength effect to the player, as well as burning and poisoning the target.
is.item.fanzia_amulet.magic_description: Amulet of a insurgent named Fanzia.
is.item.fanzia_amulet.description.1: When used, teleports the player to the block they are looking at. Max range of teleportation is 10 blocks.
